title: (x) Looking for Southern Software Inc. "YoBaby Outlin" font {Uli Stiehl}
content:
Hello,

I have been searching far and wide for the owner of this font (see attachment). I would like to purchase it for a museum project. Please contact me asap if you have any leads.

Font Name: YoBaby Outline  
Created by Southern Software 1993 (this info was in the font file when I clicked “Get info” on a Mac)

Thank you!  
Susan Brzozowski  
Tsang Seymour Design Inc. NYC

| Attachment | Size |
| --- | --- |
| [Yo Baby-Southern Software.jpg](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052710/http:/typophile.com/files/Yo%20Baby-Southern%20Software.jpg) | 106.93 KB |

 [‹ (x) 'The Assassination of Jesse James…' movie poster - WF Ashwood Cond {Angel}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052710/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38967 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) What is the original font of "Dear Sadie"? - Dear Sarah {Patricia} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052710/http:/www.typophile.com/node/38963 "Go to next forum topic")
author: sbrzozowski

comments.content:
Your sample is CMYK, which won’t display in many (most?) browsers. Here’s an RGB version. Can’t help you with the font, though.

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052710im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Yo-Baby-Southern-Software_4342.jpg)

Southern Software Inc. went broke.

Its site ssifonts.com is shut down.

Apparently, the font is freeware. See here:

[http://www.freefontsallthetime.com/mainfonts/y/](http://web.archive.org/web/20080613052710/http:/www.freefontsallthetime.com/mainfonts/y/ "http://www.freefontsallthetime.com/mainfonts/y/")

Horray! Thank you so much. Glad to see this.

Susan
